name: Chess 2 (itch) (jacb)
description:
Literally just this, but online and a bit buggy...

Source on github - https://github.com/jacblo/Chess-2 feel free to branch, make pull requests, or contribute in any way as i can't fix everything due to a lack of time. issues also can be put there so i know what bugs are 

I'm planning on adding a AI using the MinMax algorithm for this kind of game. (perhaps also a neural network for some more "personality")
